hero.desc: I develop robust and scalable solutions by applying best practices, modern architecture, and high-quality standards. Specialized in Angular, .NET, and cloud platforms.
about.title: About me
about.desc: I am a passionate software developer with experience in building web applications and enterprise solutions. I specialize in Angular for the frontend and .NET for the backend, and I have a strong interest in cloud technologies such as Azure and AWS. I strive to write clean, efficient, and maintainable code, and I am always looking to learn new technologies and improve my skills.
